 3-room apartment for rent in Tbilisi city center, most prestigious area in Vake - Parkgate complex (close to Turtle's lake); Apartment is in Modern Development, Western design renovation with new modern furniture and all needed appliances, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 2 balconies with beautiful view, Central Heating system, A/Cs, nice and quiet backyard, parking space and secured by 24 hour security service.
